engine_status: V2 CYCLE 6 COMPLETE -- ARCHITECTURE-BASED DECOMPOSITION. 8 structural forces x 10 business architectures = 187 models. New 5-axis structural durability scoring: Economic Force (35%), Structural Compounding (25%), Convergence Resistance (20%), Timing Fit (10%), Capital Efficiency (10%). KEY REVERSAL: Vertical SaaS (Cycle 5 highest) scores LOWEST (67 avg). Acquire-and-modernize (Cycle 5 harder to start) scores HIGHEST (84 avg). Physical architectures dominate because convergence resistance from physical assets >> software. TOP 5: (1) Multi-Shop CNC Rollup (86), (2) Acquire+Modernize CNC Shop (86), (3) AI Financial Intelligence Platform (86), (4) Acquire+Modernize Specialty Food (85), (5) Healthcare AI Compliance Platform (85). 3 new patterns: Physical Architecture Dominance (P-016), Data Compounding Bridge (P-017), Timing/Compounding Split (P-018).

decomposed_models_top_20.name: Acquire + Modernize: Retirement-Sale CNC Shop (CA)
decomposed_models_top_20.one_liner: Acquire $300-400K EBITDA CNC shop at 3-4x. Deploy cobots + AI scheduling/QC. COGS drops 25-30%, throughput up 30-50%. Physical assets + permits + contracts = highest convergence resistance in landscape. SBA 504 0% fees through Sept 2026.

decomposed_models_top_20.name: Acquire + Modernize: Specialty Food Producer (CA Bakery/Ethnic)
decomposed_models_top_20.one_liner: Acquire specialty food producer ($1-2M revenue, 300+ store distribution) at 3-4x EBITDA. Cobots for packaging + AI scheduling. FDA/USDA certifications + brand + distribution = highest convergence resistance in ENTIRE landscape. SBA 504 + USDA VAPG.

decomposed_models_top_20.name: Full-Service AI Finance Function for SMBs
decomposed_models_top_20.one_liner: Replace ENTIRE finance function for 1-50 employee businesses. Bookkeeping, tax, payroll tax, 1099s, financials, forecasting. $149-299/mo. AI does 95% at $0.05/month. 15-20x cost advantage. Jevons: serves 70% of SMBs who currently have NO professional finance.

decomposed_models_top_20.name: Rollup + Consolidation: Multi-Shop CNC Platform (3-5 shops)
decomposed_models_top_20.one_liner: Acquire 3-5 CNC shops over 24-36 months. Standardize AI + cobot stack. Combined $5-10M revenue, $1.5-2.5M EBITDA. Each acquisition compounds purchasing power, customer cross-sell, and AI training data. Exit multiple jumps from 3-4x to 5-7x.

decomposed_models_top_20.name: Regulatory Moat Builder: Multi-State Healthcare AI Compliance
decomposed_models_top_20.one_liner: Build compliance infrastructure for every healthcare AI company. Track 250+ state bills, 33 enacted laws, HIPAA, CMS WISeR. Generate compliance docs. Audit AI for bias. $500-5,000/mo. Every new regulation PERMANENTLY increases platform value.

decomposed_models_top_20.name: Full-Service Prior Auth + Denial Management for Independent Practices
decomposed_models_top_20.one_liner: Replace ENTIRE prior auth/denial function for independent practices. AI processes requests, generates appeals, tracks multi-payer compliance. $1,000-3,000/mo. CMS WISeR creates immediate urgency. Payer denial pattern database compounds with volume.

decomposed_models_top_20.name: Data Compounding: AI Financial Intelligence Platform
decomposed_models_top_20.one_liner: Enter via full-service bookkeeping, build cross-SMB financial intelligence from aggregated data. Benchmarking, forecasting, advisory. At 10K clients: most valuable asset in SMB finance. At 100K: unassailable. Highest structural compounding in landscape.

decomposed_models_top_20.name: Arbitrage Window: Acquire PE-Distressed Accounting Practice
decomposed_models_top_20.one_liner: Acquire CPA practices ($500K-2M revenue) being shed by distressed PE rollups at 0.5-1.0x revenue (vs 1.5-2.5x healthy). Deploy AI to automate 85-90%. $1.2T debt maturing 2027-2029 = 2-3 year window of depressed pricing.

decomposed_models_top_20.name: Platform/Infrastructure: Manufacturing AI Deployment Stack for SMEs
decomposed_models_top_20.one_liner: Build deployment infrastructure for 78% of manufacturers who adopted but haven't scaled. AI scheduling, QC, maintenance, cobot orchestration as integrated platform. $1,000-5,000/mo. 30K+ target SMEs. Production data flywheel compounds.

decomposed_models_top_20.name: Full-Service AI Cross-Border Compliance for US-LATAM Businesses
decomposed_models_top_20.one_liner: Replace ENTIRE cross-border tax/compliance function. Transfer pricing, FBAR, FATCA, dual-country filings. $299-999/mo. NO funded AI-first competitor found. Bilingual platform. 20x cost advantage vs Big 4. Strongest founder-market fit.

decomposed_models_top_20.name: Regulatory Moat Builder: Insurance AI Compliance + Bias Auditing
decomposed_models_top_20.one_liner: Build compliance for 92% of insurers using AI under 23-state regulatory patchwork. Bias auditing, fairness testing, multi-state reporting. $2,000-10,000/mo. If NAIC vendor licensing passes, platform becomes certification gate.

decomposed_models_top_20.name: Rollup + Consolidation: Multi-Facility Specialty Food Platform
decomposed_models_top_20.one_liner: Acquire 3-5 specialty food producers. Standardize AI + cobot stack. Shared distribution, compliance, purchasing. Multiple brands for different segments. FDA/USDA certified facilities + brand = second-highest convergence resistance.

decomposed_models_top_20.name: Full-Service Medical Records Abstraction (AI-Native Chart Review)
decomposed_models_top_20.one_liner: Replace ENTIRE chart abstraction function for health plans and ACOs. AI ingests clinical docs, extracts HEDIS/HCC data. $3-8/chart. 97% automatable (highest O*NET) but employment growing +8.7% = textbook Schumpeterian gap.

decomposed_models_top_20.name: Marketplace/Network: AI-Matched Business Acquisition Platform
decomposed_models_top_20.one_liner: Marketplace connecting 2.34M businesses needing succession with acquirers. AI scores automation potential, modernization opportunity. $299/mo + 2-3% success fee. Silver Tsunami provides structural supply. Also serves as deal flow pipeline for own acquisitions.

decomposed_models_top_20.name: Full-Service AI TPA (Be the Claims Processor, Don't Sell to Them)
decomposed_models_top_20.one_liner: Instead of selling AI tools to TPAs, BE an AI-native TPA. Process WC and P&C claims end-to-end. AI handles 80%+. 40-60% below traditional TPAs. TPA licensing creates structural moat. 78% adopted AI but 4% scaled = incumbents can't go AI-native.

decomposed_models_top_20.name: Vertical SaaS: FSMA 204 Food Traceability Compliance
decomposed_models_top_20.one_liner: SaaS for SMB food producers to comply with FSMA 204 traceability rule (enforceable 2026). $200-500/mo. FoodLogiQ serves enterprise only. Strongest timing in vertical SaaS category. Regulatory catalyst with specific enforcement date.

decomposed_models_top_20.name: Data Compounding: Clinical Denial Intelligence Platform
decomposed_models_top_20.one_liner: Enter via prior auth service, build comprehensive payer denial pattern database. 'Aetna denies 62% of CPT 97110 for LBP in NJ -- here's the 78% success appeal strategy.' Denial intelligence more valuable than the appeals themselves.

decomposed_models_top_20.name: Platform/Infrastructure: Finance-as-a-Service API for Micro-Firms
decomposed_models_top_20.one_liner: Financial infrastructure API for micro-firms. Any platform can embed bookkeeping, tax, compliance, payroll via API. Like Stripe for finance operations. Coasean shrinkage creates demand. API integration = extreme switching costs.

decomposed_models_top_20.name: Physical Production + AI: Precision CNC-as-a-Service
decomposed_models_top_20.one_liner: AI-native CNC facility from scratch. AI handles quoting, scheduling, QC. Cobots handle machine tending. 30-40% below traditional job shops. Jevons: lower prices expand custom fabrication market. Better as evolution AFTER acquire-and-modernize.

decomposed_models_top_20.name: Regulatory Moat Builder: Mental Health AI Compliance Platform
decomposed_models_top_20.one_liner: Compliance infrastructure for mental health AI deployers. Track 21 bills, 7 laws, 5 states. Safety testing, content moderation frameworks. $500-2,000/mo. Regulatory wave early but accelerating. First-mover defines compliance standard.

not_recommended.name: Vertical SaaS: AI Therapist Notes
not_recommended.reason: Blueprint 50K clinicians + 5 competitors. Tool-layer commodity. Convergence resistance = 0.

not_recommended.name: Vertical SaaS: AI Tax for Gig Workers
not_recommended.reason: FlyFin $15M + Keeper $42M. Well-funded direct competitors. Low ARPU ($150/yr).

not_recommended.name: Vertical SaaS: AI Clinical Documentation
not_recommended.reason: Abridge $250M, Nuance DAX, DeepScribe. Market captured.

not_recommended.name: Vertical SaaS: AI Auto Claims Photo
Vertical SaaS: AI Irrigation CA Vineyards
not_recommended.reason: Orchard Robotics $22M + OEM risk (Deere See & Spray).

monitoring.note: Goldman $527B hyperscaler capex deepens overhang. Build crash-resilient.

structural_shifts_active.shift: AI Inference Cost Collapse (50x/yr median decline)
structural_shifts_active.note: Enables ALL models in landscape. DeepSeek R1 at 90% below Western competitors. Cost floor effectively zero vs human labor.

structural_shifts_active.shift: Baumol Cost Disease Cure ($207B quantified automatable)
structural_shifts_active.note: Architecture analysis: full-service replacement captures 5x more value than vertical SaaS. $139B accounting + $36B insurance + $20B legal + $9B medical records.
Acquire-and-modernize + rollup architectures score 84 avg -- highest in landscape. SBA 504 fee waiver time-sensitive through Sept 2026.

structural_shifts_active.shift: Robotics x AI Compound Cost Compression
structural_shifts_active.note: Cobots $25-60K, ROI 6-18mo. 98% exploring, 20% ready. Architecture: ACQUIRE (84) beats BUILD (68) by 16 points.
Now a distinct architecture type (regulatory_moat_builder, 77 avg). Each new regulation permanently increases platform value.
$1.2T debt maturing 2027-2029. Interest coverage declining to 4.6x. Arbitrage window for distressed acquisitions.
Micro-firm formation creates demand for platform_infrastructure architecture. More firms = more customers for business services.
AI infra reckoning 2026. Application layer captures value from infrastructure overinvestment. Build crash-resilient.
Architecture validation: full-service (79) beats vertical SaaS (67). Incumbents CANNOT self-cannibalize to enter full-service layer.
Extended beyond Bench/Woebot to structural PE distress. Arbitrage window architecture captures 2-3 year window.

key_insight: ARCHITECTURE DETERMINES STRUCTURAL DURABILITY. Cycle 5 found niche > sector. Cycle 6 finds architecture > niche. A full-service bookkeeping play (84) beats a restaurant-specific vertical SaaS play (71) EVEN THOUGH both serve SMB accounting. HOW you enter matters more than WHERE you enter. Physical architectures (acquire-and-modernize, rollup) create convergence resistance from physical assets, permits, and contracts that software CANNOT replicate. Data compounding is the bridge that makes software plays structurally defensible. Optimal strategy: START physical (capture timing window), BUILD digital in parallel (capture compounding).

YC-GRANULARITY DECOMPOSITION: 11 sectors -> 102 models. Customer-segment scoring.
